lead_paragraph: Defending champion and top seed Novak Djokovic moved a step closer to a fifth title at Indian Wells with a 7-6(5) 6-2 victory over long-time rival Rafa Nadal in the semi-finals of the BNP Paribas Open in California on Saturday.
snippet: Defending champion and top seed Novak Djokovic moved a step closer to a fifth title at Indian Wells with a 7-6(5) 6-2 victory over long-time rival Rafa Nadal in the semi-finals of the BNP Paribas Open in California on Saturday....

headline.main: Djokovic to Meet Raonic in Indian Wells Final
headline.print_headline: Djokovic to Meet Raonic in Indian Wells Final
